name: Meerapfel - Machetero - Short Robusto
additionalNotes: Built upon the uncompromising tradition of our ancestral processes, MEERAPFEL Cigar is perpetuating our family legacy into the future by blending the abandoned past with the most modern innovations. MEERAPFEL Cigar is, in its entirety and every element of its deconstruction: incomparable.Â To sublime and reinvent the quintessential cigar experience, MEERAPFEL has deconstructed every element and process composing a premium cigar.
